glamour.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the attractive and exciting quality of being connected with wealth and success
glamour.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Forget all you read about the glamour of television.
glamour.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a style or attractiveness that suggests wealth
glamour.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Designer clothes are not a passport to instant glamour.
